ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Roleplaying guild
ygData.msgSnippet: On the normal servers its very hard to roleplay. If you seek roleplay you should consider the Firiona Vie server. Its ruleset encourages roleplaying and the
ygData.messageBody:
On the normal servers its very hard to roleplay. If you seek roleplay you
should consider the Firiona Vie server. Its ruleset encourages roleplaying
and the normal servers do not. Thats the best advice i can give you.



-----Original Message-----
From: Emily Bembeneck [mailto:ebembeneck@...]
Sent: Tuesday, February 19, 2002 7:45 PM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Roleplaying guild


Hey.. does anyone know of a good roleplaying guild on Mithaniel Marr???



-
Adarel Windsinger
Druid of Tunare of the 22nd moon
